These tests constitute the unit tests for snapshot generation
an empty differential, generate the snapshot, and then insist it must match the base
The snapshot must have the same number of elements, in the same order, with matching paths
The snapshot elements must be the same - check short description
The snapshot elements must be the same - check min cardinality
The snapshot elements must be the same - check max cardinality
The snapshot elements must be the same - check binding
an empty differential, generate the snapshot, and then insist it must match the base - use a resource with recusion
The snapshot must have the same number of elements, in the same order, with matching paths
The snapshot elements must be the same
fix a cardinality
The snapshot must have the same number of elements, in the same order, with matching paths
The snapshot elements must be the same
The patient.identifier cardinality must be right
fix a cardinality
The patient.identifier documentation must be right
fix a type
The patient.deceased type must be right
The patient.deceased type must be right
fix a type (with renaming)
The patient.deceased type must be right
The patient.deceased type must be right

The mapping must be made
